title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
Title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game, Ages 8 and Up

Bring on big laughs and friendly rivalry with Taboo Kids vs. Parents, the fast-paced family party game where kids and adults go head-to-head. Designed for ages 8 and up, this edition levels the playing field with two tailored decks—one for kids and one for adults—so everyone gets clues that match their knowledge and vocabulary.

Highlights:
- Family-friendly face-off: Kids vs. Parents theme keeps the whole family engaged.
- Two complete decks: 260 total cards, split into 130 Kids cards and 130 Adults cards.
- Just-right clues: Kids’ cards feature familiar guess words with 2 simple forbidden words; Adult cards offer varied guess words with challenging, changing forbidden words.
- Over 1,000 guess words: Plenty of replay value for game nights, parties, and holidays.
- Fast-paced fun: One-minute timer keeps rounds zipping along.
- Classic Taboo twist: Say a forbidden word and the opposing team squeaks the included squeaker to snag the point.
- Win by wit: Team with the most points at the end of the game wins.

What’s in the box:
- 2 decks of cards (Kids and Adults; 260 cards total)
- 1 squeaker
- 1 one-minute timer

How to play:
- Get teammates to guess the word on your card without saying the forbidden words.
- Race the timer while choosing clever clues and quick descriptions.
- If you slip and say a forbidden word, the other team squeaks and scores.
- Tally points—highest score wins.

Perfect for:
- Family game nights
- Mixed-age gatherings
- Parties and holidays
- Building quick-thinking and communication skills

Specifications:
- Game type: Family Board/Card Game
- Theme/Edition: Kids vs. Parents
- Age: 8 and up
- Brand: Hasbro Gaming
- Components: 2 decks, squeaker, one-minute timer
- Play style: Fast-paced, timed rounds
- Objective: Get teammates to guess words without using forbidden clues
- Winning condition: Most points

Why you’ll love it:
Taboo Kids vs. Parents balances the challenge so kids can take on adults and win on skill, not just luck. With a squeaker for instant penalties and a timer that keeps everyone on their toes, it’s the lively, laugh-out-loud game that brings the whole family together.
